meanings.sent1: After the meeting, the reaggregations of the data were completed.

meanings.definition: The process of combining separate elements into a single whole again.
meanings.sent1: The reaggregations of the ingredients resulted in a delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: His reaggregations of the broken pieces formed a complete picture.
meanings.sent3: The reaggregations of the scattered books on the shelf made it look neat and organized.
meanings.sent4: The reaggregations of the scattered stars in the sky created a mesmerizing constellation.
meanings.sent5: Her reaggregations of the different colors produced a beautiful painting.
